snippet: Only 39 percent of New York voters said they would like to see Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo run for president in 2016, compared with 54 percent who said Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton should mount another White House bid.
abstract: Only 39 percent of New York voters said they would like to see Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo run for president in 2016, compared with 54 percent who said Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton should mount another White House bid.

headline.main: In Poll, New Yorkers Like Cuomo for Governor and Clinton for President
